Excellent explanation in a friendly manner, answered all our doubts politely. When most of the doctors threatened to remove the plate fixed in my right leg, he is the only doctor given explanation clearly and informed no surgery needed.  Doctor was very helpful and service minded.

****** ** ************* I went for a second opinion. Se said the exact same thing which my first doctor told . I only have issue with the fee. On Practo it is mentioned 1000 wherein I was charged 1500. Receptionist said it is up to doctor how much they charge. I never knew fee varied from patient to patient . 
On top of 1500 I was charged 250 as registration fee and 500 for physiotherapy session ( 500 is Justified ) 

Do not recommend him from fees point of view

didn't work . For me it's shear loss of time  money and effort. I am totally disappointed

My daughter aged 11 experiencing difficulty in walking ,especially on her right foot. She had spine surgery at the age of one because shed had no sensation on her right foot. After surgery she has gained the sense however the the growth deficiency is still their.
